item.title: Melinda French Gates says some tech titans siding with Trump are doing ‘what some comms person’ tells them instead of living by their values
item.description: "We, of all times right now, should be living those values out, not pivoting to what some comms person tells us is the right thing to do. That would b...

item.title: Tesla robotaxi finally launches but hiccups include long wait times, Pokemon-style hunts for the car and even driving in wrong lane
item.description: While Tesla attempted to minimize risks in part by inviting out-of-town influencers from the Tesla community, there were some issues.

item.title: The IPO market is booming—and more big listings like Klarna and StubHub could come this fall
item.description: More companies have gone public this year than any time since 2021.

item.title: The Google exec who oversaw $66.9 billion in ad revenue so far this year says AI is ‘changing the game on what is possible’
item.description: Vidhya Srinivasan led Amazon Web Services' first cloud data centers launches before taking on a pivotal transformation at Google.

item.title: DeFi company Blueprint Finance raises $9.5 million from Polychain Capital
item.description: The company will spend the money raised in this round on hiring, engineering and marketing.
